name: Shleepy Time Catching Z's
description:
A game as old as time.

You have awakened the sandman from his slumber.

As an indestructible bed, test your focus and reflexes to guide all sheep towards the dreamworld. Despite the efforts of the sandman to stand in your way and get his sleep back.

How far can you go?... Before the sandman wins.


FEATURES:

- 3 difficulty settings: Easy - Normal - Hard

- 124 groups of sheep, hand-composed, more than 3000 sheep

- 7 different minions and 10 sandman appearances, trying to stop you

- catch-shoot and slow-motion abilities for the bed

- 3 special abilities you can earn while playing, designed to keep you going



Gameguide in the menu screen.

Button controls overlay available, set on/off in title menu screen or in ingame menu.

Touchscreen controls for touchscreen devices.

Keyboard or X-box controller for PC.
